'''Martin Shaw''' (born [[21 January]] [[1945]]) is a British actor known for his roles in ''Judge John Deed'' and ''Inspector George Gently''. He also works as a narrator and voiceover artist and has narrated the unabridged audiobooks of both ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.

==Roles==
* [[2000]]: ''[[The Hobbit]]'' (audiobook, unabridged) -  Narrator
* [[2002]]: ''[[The Silmarillion]]'' (audiobook, unabridged) - Narrator
